Chez moi
Social Web App

I developed an app that combined social networking with the traditional concept of the dinner party. The internal APIs connects dinner parties with diners. To enable search for dinners around the world on a specific date, I integrated Google places APIs.

  • Demo
  • Github

Veni Vidi Vici
A Discovery Adventure

A collaborate project designed to bring a more inspirational approach to travel planning. This application can be for both discovery and budgeting. A MEAN stack application complete with authentication, auth, and RESTful API.

  • Demo
  • Github

Game Set Match
Got the balls, play tennis!

The app enables users to find Tennis courts and match up with players of similar skill levels and availability. The app enables them to both play at a time and place of their mutual convenience, while also connecting them with a pool of players to challenge and help them develop their skills.

  • Demo
  • Github

Buon Appetito
Memory game

I designed a front-end memory game with an Italian culinary theme. The various technologies I used in the game’s development included HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript and jQuery.

  • Demo
  • Github
